description: Manage a service principal's password or certificate credentials.

commands.name: az ad sp credential delete
commands.summary: Delete a service principal's password or certificate credentials.
examples: az ad sp credential delete --id 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 --key-id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx
az ad sp credential delete --id 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 --key-id xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --cert

commands.name: az ad sp credential list
commands.summary: List a service principal's password or certificate credential metadata. (The content of the password or certificate credential is not retrievable.).

commands.name: az ad sp credential reset
commands.summary: Reset a service principal's password or certificate credentials.
examples:
az ad sp credential reset --id 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 --cert "@~/cert.pem" --append
`cert.pem` contains the following content
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----  <<< this line is optional
MIICoT...
-----END CERTIFICATE-----    <<< this line is optional
